DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information on behalf of the signed-in user. Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information on your behalf.Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information, without a signed-in user. Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.
